snippet.title: Samurai Love Ballad: Party - A Romance to Die for!
snippet.description:
War rules over Sengoku Era Japan..
Your brother is taken away, leaving you no choice...

You must serve at the castle to protect him!

Twelve of the nation's strongest, bravest samurai await,
all with their own passionate desires, each with their own hidden charm...

Which lord will you serve?

Delve into a romance that will affect history for centuries to come.

It all starts with YOU! 

▼Download NOW on iOS and Android
https://app.adjust.com/16310is

▼Follow us on social media:
https://www.facebook.com/Voltage.SLBP/
https://twitter.com/Voltage_SLBP
https://www.instagram.com/otomeromance/

▼Official Website:
https://voltageapps.com/samurai/
